alert.note: Alert for Accomack (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Accomack County through 415 PM EDT... At 314 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Pocomoke City. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and locally heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Horntown, Oak Hall, Atlantic, New Church and Greenbackville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
